divs: Sighting DetailsWe kept seeing lights traveling very fast as we were looking at stars in our yard then more lights zipped by n a couple just seemed to disappear and then out of nowhere three then four came from all directions, we thought they were going to collide or were attacking each other then passed so close they looked like one light for a split second and continued on then just dissappeared we were frozen in fear n then ran inside a bit later.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Sioux Falls
There were no other sightings in Sioux Falls on or around July 11th 2013
Summary: There were several in every direction all at once
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
